line_1: The Coin may mend a Tinker's Kettle —
line_2: May be thrown in; And for the Mettle,

line_1: But had not Sides, like sturdy Kettle,
To get auld Scotland back her kettle!
line_2: Arouse my boys! exert your mettle,

line_1: To get auld Scotland back her kettle!
line_2: Or faith! I'll wad my new pleugh-pettle,

line_1: To get auld Scotland back her kettle!
line_2: She'll teach you, wi' a reekan whittle,
